Module Photos02
Package model

Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a user with albums and related functionality. Serializable to allow object serialization for saving/loading. Author: Farhan Shah
See Also:

      public ArrayList<Photo> getOrTaggedPhotos(ArrayList<Tag> taggedlist)
      Returns a list of photos that are tagged with at least one tag from the given list.
      Parameters:
      taggedlist - The list of tags to search for.
      Returns:
      The list of photos matching the OR condition.

    • getAndTaggedPhotos

      public ArrayList<Photo> getAndTaggedPhotos(ArrayList<Tag> taggedlist)
      Returns a list of photos that are tagged with all tags from the given list.
      Parameters:
      taggedlist - The list of tags to search for.
      Returns:
      The list of photos matching the AND condition.
